name: U.S world war ll navy seals
name_original: U.S world war ll navy seals
description: you're the soldier with the camouflage outfit if the German soldier shoots you your  life grip is going down if the life grip goes all the way down its game over use the space bar to shoot the german but aim at the german soldier then shoot at him when you're ready to shoot if its game over when you're life grip its out save your high score so you wont forget
